  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120203</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120203</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Ugotovi,  če se gibalna količina ohranja</string>
            <string language="en">Determine if momentum is conserved</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie fest, wenn Momentum konserviert wird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminez si l'élan est économisé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determine se o momentum for conservado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determini se la quantità di moto si conserva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορίστε εάν η ορμή συντηρείται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determínese si se conserva el ímpetu</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Trije enaki vozički trčijo v sistemu brez zračnega upora in trenja.</string>
            <string language="en">Three equal carts collide in a system where no air or ground friction applies.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ohranitveni zakon</string>
            <string language="en">conservation law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gibalna količina</string>
            <string language="en">momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drei gleiche Karren stoßen in ein System 
zusammen, in dem keine Luft- oder Bodenfriktion zutrifft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trois chariots égaux se heurtent dans un 
système où aucun frottement d'air ou de la terre ne s'applique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Três carros iguais colidem em um sistema onde 
nenhuma fricção do ar ou da terra se aplique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tre carrelli uguali si scontrano in un sistema in
cui nessun attrito di messa a terra o dell'aria si applica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρία ίσα κάρρα συγκρούονται σε ένα σύστημα όπου 
καμία τριβή αέρα ή εδάφους δεν ισχύει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tres carros iguales chocan en un sistema donde 
ninguna fricción del aire o de la tierra se aplica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erhaltung Gesetz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">loi d'économie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">élan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do conservation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge di conservazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">quantità di moto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος συντήρησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ορμή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley de la conservación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ímpetu</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
